item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @bankotsu11 bankotsu11
item.description:
@bankotsu11 wrote:

well i have pieces of code that are similar, but idk if they would work.

ex.[code] public void resetDuel() {
println(“duel reset”);
closeInterface();
canOffer = true;
duel_with = 0;
duelRequested = false;
duelConfirmed = false;
duelConfirmed2 = false;
offeredItems.clear();
otherOfferedItems.clear();
duelFight = false;
inDuel = false;
duelRule = new boolean[] { false, false, false, false, false, true,
false, true, false, true, false, true, true, true, true, true, true, true, true,

true, true, true };
}[/code]

so yeah…

also i have like 4 orphaned case errors, but i checked them and they were all looking normal, and they were with the other cases just like them…

these are them.

case 68: talk("Your first task, find your way out of this cave!", 398); toX = 3168; toY = 9571; break; case 64: talk("It will cost you 1k to get to the minning spot!", 398); deleteItem(561, 100); toX = 3021; toY = 3369; break; { case 41: talk("Your last task is to fight the 4 bosses.", 251); deleteItem(861, 1); q3 = 3; break;

and for somereason case 41 is now giving me 100 errors… i deleted the {,compiled and i got 100 errors, so i put it back and now i still have 100… uggh

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Conventions help:

	public void RemoveAllDuelItems() {
		for (int i = 0; i < duelItems.length; i++) {
			if (duelItems[i] > 0) {
				fromDuel((duelItems[i] - 1), i, duelItemsN[i]);
				duelItem Username Here;
			}else
				Acceptchallenge
			}else
				Decline challenge
			}
		}
	}

Your error is because these are just words. I’m guessing you got them from a C&P tutorial so make sure you C&P it right and followed the whole tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @bankotsu11 bankotsu11
item.description:
@bankotsu11 wrote:

okay well in part of my servers duel code, it gives me about 3-5 errors on it…

public void RemoveAllDuelItems() { for (int i = 0; i < duelItems.length; i++) { if (duelItems[i] > 0) { fromDuel((duelItems[i] - 1), i, duelItemsN[i]); duelItem Username Here; }else Acceptchallenge }else Decline challenge } } }

thats the code, and im pretty sure its because of the

duelItem Username Here; }else Acceptchallenge }else Decline challenge } } }
but idk how to fix it =\ help?
